dialogue.text: I see you’ve made it past that last battle.
that was kinda tuff! All this rock-flying stuff is just too overkilled, but i managed to pass
Enough with this nonsensical blabbering. Make no mistake, pal, I am nowhere near my true capability.
But that’s only to ensure less collateral damage. Besides, I’d rather not have problems with your girlfriend’s parents.
What have you done to help anyone?
I know you’ve battled a nearly infinite amount of other opponents in other realities.
But you haven’t done anything to help any of them.
Think on this, dwarf: Am I really the villain, or are you the true villain?
That arena that we trained in the first time we met..
All I wanted to do was help train a new person to get better at singing.
But you just kept coming back. And you ruined my life.
Just as you have so many others.
Your rampage ends now. Show me what you can do.
